cpsr.model.components

Class PredictionVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpsr.model.components.PredictionVector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PredictionVector
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Simple class used to encapsulate prediction vector (i.e. the state vector of PSR)
    Author:
    William Hamilton
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PredictionVector(org.jblas.DoubleMatrix vector)
      Constructs a prediction vector from a matrix (vector) passed as argument.
      PredictionVector(int size)
      Constructs a prediction vector of specified size with all values initialized to zero.

      • PredictionVector

        public PredictionVector(org.jblas.DoubleMatrix vector)
        Constructs a prediction vector from a matrix (vector) passed as argument. This matrix passed must be vector and have second dimension equal to 1 or exception thrown.
        Parameters:
        vector -
